meanings.english_definition: feeling or showing pleasure or contentment

etymology.origin: సంతోషం (santōṣaṁ - happiness) + గా (gā - suffix making it adverbial)

cultural_notes: Telugu culture places high value on expressing happiness and joy in social interactions
The phrase 'సంతోషంగా ఉండండి' is commonly used as a blessing or farewell

example_sentences.sentence: మా అమ్మ సంతోషంగా ఉన్నప్పుడు మాకు అందరికీ ఖుషి
example_sentences.translation: When our mother is happy, we all feel joy
